square.title: Command Reroll
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: BATTLE TACTIC
WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a HIT ROLL, WOUND ROLL, DAMAGE ROLL, SAVING THROW, ADVANCE ROLL, CHARGE ROLL, DESPERATE ESCAPE TEST, HAZARDOUS TEST, or NUMBER OF ATTACKS ROLL
TARGET: null
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: You re-roll that ROLL, TEST, or SAVE.

square.title: Counter-Offensive
square.content:
COST: 2CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: FIGHT PHASE, just after an ENEMY UNIT has fought
TARGET: One UNIT from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

square.title: Epic Challenge
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: EPIC DEED
WHEN: FIGHT PHASE, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more attached units is selected to fight.
TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the PRECISION ability.

square.title: Insane Bravery
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: EPIC DEED
WHEN: BATTLE-SHOCK step of your COMMAND PHASE, just after you have failed a BATTLE-SHOCK TEST taken for a unit from your army.
TARGET: The unit from your army that the BATTLE-SHOCK test was just taken for.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not BATTLE-SHOCKED as a result.

square.title: Grenade
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: WARGEAR
WHEN: Your SHOOTING PHASE.
TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within engagement range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement range of any units from your army and is within 8 inches of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 MW.

square.title: Tank Shock
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: Your CHARGE PHASE.
TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon’s Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit’s Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

square.title: Rapid Ingress
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: End of your opponent’s MOVEMENT phase
TARGET: One unit from your army that is in RESERVES.
RESTRICTION: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in
EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.

square.title: Fire Overwatch
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: Your opponent’s MOVEMENT or CHARGE phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your SHOOTING phase.
RESTRICTION: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.

square.title: Go to ground
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: BATTLE TACTIC
WHEN: Your opponent’s SHOOTING phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

square.title: Smokescreen
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: WARGEAR
WHEN: Your opponent’s SHOOTING phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
TARGET: One Smoke unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability.

square.title: Heroic Intervention
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Core
DETACHMENT: null
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: Your opponent’s CHARGE phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
RESTRICTION: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a Walker. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.

square.title: Strike from the Shadows
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: WARGEAR
WHEN: Start of the Command phase.
TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: That objective marker is said to be SABOTAGED, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the START or END of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

square.title: Strike from the Shadows
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: BATTLE TACTIC
WHEN: Your SHOOTING phase.
TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the BS and AP of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

square.title: Armor of Contempt
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: BATTLE TACTIC
WHEN: Your opponent’s SHOOTING phase or the FIGHT phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

square.title: Surgical Strikes
square.content:
COST: 2CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: BATTLE TACTIC
WHEN: Any FIGHT phase
TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
RESTRICTION: none
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the PRECISION ability.

square.title: Calculated Feint
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: Your opponent’s CHARGE phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
RESTRICTION: You cannot select a unit that is within ENGAGEMENT RANGE of one or more enemy units.
EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.

square.title: Guerrilla Tactics
square.content:
COST: 1CP
FACTION: Space Marines
DETACHMENT: Vanguard Spearhead
TYPE: STRATEGIC PLOY
WHEN: End of your opponent’s FIGHT phase.
TARGET: Up to two PHOBOS and/or SCOUT SQUAD units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
RESTRICTION: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.
EFFECT: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into STRATEGIC RESERVES.
